name: red
func:
msg.payload =
{
    red : 255,
    green : 0,
    blue : 0,
    white : 0,
    temp : 5000, // optional 3000..6500K for white (shelly bulb RGBW)
    brightness : 10,
    gain : 10,
    transition : 2000, // optional 0..5000ms
    on : true,
    mode : 'color' // optional for switching mode
}
return msg;
